Think of the average working class family who have to pay IHT by instalments over 10 years and have to pay the going IHT interest rate of 3% while the bank rate is 0.5%.
 If the IHT rate was restored  to its former rate of  1/2% above bank rate I am certain the money saved by the IHT payee would be put back into the economy instead of being misused by government.
